price: 多福哉安拉！他降示准则给他的仆人，以便他做众世界的警告者。
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī nazzala al-fur'qāna ʿalā ʿabdihi liyakūna lil'ʿālamīna nadhīran
